panels.description: The number of authentication events raised by all instances during the interval.
panels.title: Authentications

panels.description: The number of SSO events raised by all instances during the interval
panels.title: SSO

panels.description: The number fo all oauth tokens issued by all instances during the interval
panels.title: Tokens Issued

panels.description: Indicates if all the instances are up and running
panels.title: Status

panels.description: Indicates if there were any error logs detected on any of the instances
panels.title: Error

panels.description: Indicates if there were any debug or trace logs detected on any of the instances
panels.title: Debug

panels.description: Indicates if the server is up and running
panels.title: Status

panels.description: Indicates if there were any error logs detected
panels.title: Error

panels.description: Indicates if there were any debug or trace logs detected on the instance
panels.title: Debug

panels.description: Shows the number of log entries by their type
panels.title: Logs

panels.description: Shows the CPU usage in percent
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Shows the memory usage in bytes
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Shows the time in seconds that it takes to process an HTTP request. This includes requests to admin and runtime nodes.
panels.title: HTTP Timing

panels.description: Shows the time in seconds that it takes to process database queries.
panels.title: DAP Timing

panels.description: Shows the rate of SSO events.
panels.title: SSO Rate

panels.description: Shows the rate of login events.
panels.title: Login Rate

panels.description: Shows the rate of issued tokens by their type.
panels.title: Issued Token Rate

panels.description: Shows the rate of issued tokens by their type.
panels.title: Revoked Token Rate
